title: temporarily unavailable Error, Too heavy SQL insertion?
body:
I got a "The page you are looking for is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later." every time in the middle of a function.

I thing it's because my function is too heavy ?

In this function I do a request on a API that return me an array with more than 1000 values. For each of theses values I need to redo a request on this API to get complet informations. And finally I insert in my data base all informations I get.

     foreach ($userNumber as $value) {

         $userInfo = $service->get($value);

       updateUsers($value, $userInfo, $accountNb);

     }

$service->get($value) return informations linked to the $value.

The updateUsers() function check if the user is already in the database. If yes, it update the user, if not, it insert the user into the table.
